reviewText: This is a powerful video that teaches to children and adults the importance of love and forgiveness. It also is excellent at teaching how to distinguish between the flesh vs the Spirit. I plan to show it during Wednesday night Kid's Club at my church as a culmination of studying the book of Romans. Thank you for this wonderful and moving Christian movie for children.

but may have been cute, i still like these for sabbath, even if i don't get it all first watch i can rewatch other sabbaths if i own it so its ok..ii like them more when longer though maybe but oh well
